message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a unique opportunity, and I believe you'll find the value well worth the price. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $950,000 for it. I hope this revised price aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your budget,  $950,000 is below what I need to consider. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000 to reflect your interest, but this is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I've reviewed my finances again and am willing to increase my offer to $1,000,000. I hope this meets your needs and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
